string.original: A {docref TreeNode} representing an {docref XDMNode}.
string.translation: A {docref TreeNode} representing an {docref XDMNode}.

string.original: Adapter allowing for {docref XDMNode} hierarchies or {docref XDMNodeSet} collections to function as a {docref TreeModel} for {docref XDMTreeControl}.
string.translation: Adapter allowing for {docref XDMNode} hierarchies or {docref XDMNodeSet} collections to function as a {docref TreeModel} for {docref XDMTreeControl}.

string.original: An implementation of {docref DefaultFrameTreeIcon} used by {docref XDMTreeControl}
string.translation: An implementation of {docref DefaultFrameTreeIcon} used by {docref XDMTreeControl}

string.original: An implementation of {docref DefaultTreeItem} used by {docref XDMTreeControl}
string.translation: An implementation of {docref DefaultTreeItem} used by {docref XDMTreeControl}

string.original: An implementation of {docref TreeControl} specialized for display of XML hierarchies using the {docref XDMTreeModel} adapter.
string.translation: An implementation of {docref TreeControl} specialized for display of XML hierarchies using the {docref XDMTreeModel} adapter.

string.original: Assigns a "category" {ctext String} to the specified {docref XDMTreeNode}.
string.translation: Assigns a "category" {ctext String} to the specified {docref XDMTreeNode}.

string.original: Clears all "category" {ctext String}s.
string.translation: Clears all "category" {ctext String}s.

Create this {ctext XDMTreeControl}. data-model,the {docref XDMTreeModel} to be displayed. open?,specifies whether the root node should be expanded. tree-item-creation-proc,"factory" procedure for creating {docref TreeItem}s item-arguments,allows specification of common parameters for {docref TreeItem}s, such as {docref EventHandler}s. xdm-text-breakable?,specifies {docref-abbr XDMTreeControl.xdm-text-breakable?} ...,the rest arguments are passed on to {docref TreeControl}.
Create this {ctext XDMTreeModel}. root,the {docref XDMNodeSet} representing the root of this model. read-only?,indicates whether modification is allowed.
Create this {ctext XDMTreeModel}. root,the {docref XDMNode} representing the root of this model. read-only?,indicates whether modification is allowed.
Create this {ctext XDMTreeNode}. node,the {docref XDMNode} representing the root of this model.
Create this {ctext XDMTreeNode}. xs,the {docref XDMNodeSet} representing the root of this model.

string.original: Create this {docref DefaultTreeItem} with specified arguments.
string.translation: Create this {docref DefaultTreeItem} with specified arguments.

string.original: Create this {docref DefaultTreeItem}.
string.translation: Create this {docref DefaultTreeItem}.
For {docref XDMNode}s contained in {docref-abbr XDMDocument.modifiable?} {docref XDMDocument}s, the {ctext XDMTreeModel} follows {docref XDMEvent}s and updates accordingly.

string.original: Governs the {docref background} {docref FillPattern} used to display different categories.
string.translation: Governs the {docref background} {docref FillPattern} used to display different categories.

string.original: Governs the {docref color} {docref FillPattern} used to display different kinds of {docref XDMNode} content.
string.translation: Governs the {docref color} {docref FillPattern} used to display different kinds of {docref XDMNode} content.

string.original: Modify this object visually to indicate the state of its {docref XDMTreeItem.category} property.
string.translation: Modify this object visually to indicate the state of its {docref XDMTreeItem.category} property.

string.original: Normally, the {docref text-breakable?} property of {docref TreeItem}s in a {docref TreeControl} is forced to be {ctext false}. This property counteracts that behavior.
string.translation: Normally, the {docref text-breakable?} property of {docref TreeItem}s in a {docref TreeControl} is forced to be {ctext false}. This property counteracts that behavior.

string.original: Provides a standard visual representation of the XML hierarchy. The colors used to indicate different kinds of content can be customized using {docref XDMTreeControl.color-map}. Allows constituent nodes to be categorized by assignment of a 'catgeory' {ctext String}. The colors used to highlight selected and categorized nodes can be customized using {docref XDMTreeControl.background-map}.
string.translation: Provides a standard visual representation of the XML hierarchy. The colors used to indicate different kinds of content can be customized using {docref XDMTreeControl.color-map}. Allows constituent nodes to be categorized by assignment of a 'catgeory' {ctext String}. The colors used to highlight selected and categorized nodes can be customized using {docref XDMTreeControl.background-map}.

string.original: Request regeneration of {docref TreeItem} for each displayed {docref TreeNode}
string.translation: Request regeneration of {docref TreeItem} for each displayed {docref TreeNode}

string.original: Returns the "category" {ctext String} assigned to the specified {docref XDMTreeNode}, if any.
string.translation: Returns the "category" {ctext String} assigned to the specified {docref XDMTreeNode}, if any.

string.original: Returns the {docref XDMTreeNode} corresponding to the specifed {docref XDMNode}, if it exists.
string.translation: Returns the {docref XDMTreeNode} corresponding to the specifed {docref XDMNode}, if it exists.

string.original: Returns the {docref XDMTreeNode} corresponding to the specifed {docref XDMNode}.
string.translation: Returns the {docref XDMTreeNode} corresponding to the specifed {docref XDMNode}.

string.original: Returns the {docref background} {docref FillPattern} used to display the specified "category" {ctext String}, if any.
string.translation: Returns the {docref background} {docref FillPattern} used to display the specified "category" {ctext String}, if any.

string.original: Returns the {docref color} {docref FillPattern} used to display the specified kind of {docref XDMNode} content, if any.
string.translation: Returns the {docref color} {docref FillPattern} used to display the specified kind of {docref XDMNode} content, if any.

string.original: See {docref XDMTreeControl.background-map}.
string.translation: See {docref XDMTreeControl.background-map}.

string.original: See {docref XDMTreeControl.set-category}.
string.translation: See {docref XDMTreeControl.set-category}.

string.original: Specifies whether text contained in {docref XDMTreeItem} labels can be broken over multiple lines.
string.translation: Specifies whether text contained in {docref XDMTreeItem} labels can be broken over multiple lines.

string.original: The "category" {ctext String} assigned this {docref XDMTreeItem.node}, if any.
string.translation: The "category" {ctext String} assigned this {docref XDMTreeItem.node}, if any.

The following keys are used: {ctext "element-name"} {em-dash} the {docref XDMElement.qualified-name} {ctext "text"} {em-dash} the {docref XDMText.content} {ctext "attribute-name"} {em-dash} the {docref XDMAttribute.qualified-name} {ctext "attribute"} {em-dash} the {docref XDMAttribute.value} {ctext "document"} {em-dash} the {docref XDMDocument} {ctext "processing-instruction"} {em-dash} the {docref XDMProcessingInstruction.target} {ctext "nodeset"} {em-dash} the {docref XDMNodeSet} icon

string.original: The predefined category {monospace "selected"} is used for display of currently selected nodes (maintained in the {docref TreeControl.selection} collection). The category {monospace "highlight"} is also predefined. Additional categories can be added, corresponding to those assigned by {docref-abbr XDMTreeControl.set-catagory}.
string.translation: The predefined category "selected" is used for display of currently selected nodes (maintained in the {docref TreeControl.selection} collection). The category "highlight" is also predefined. Additional categories can be added, corresponding to those assigned by {docref-abbr XDMTreeControl.set-catagory}.

string.original: The visual display of different categories is governed by {docref XDMTreeControl.background-map}.
string.translation: The visual display of different categories is governed by {docref XDMTreeControl.background-map}.

string.original: The {docref XDMDocument} containing the root of this model, if any.
string.translation: The {docref XDMDocument} containing the root of this model, if any.

string.original: This package contains support for displaying XML Document Models as a hierarchy of expandable elements.
string.translation: This package contains support for displaying XML Document Models as a hierarchy of expandable elements.
